response.overview: Years ago, a Vanjing Mountain woman named Si Fan left her hometown and was never heard from again. Years later, a city girl named Linxi came to Fanjing Mountain to shoot a short movie. She meets a father and son, Old Witch and Little Witch, who are carrying sliding poles on Fanjing Mountain. A heavy rain stops the three from going up the mountain, and they take shelter in a pavilion at the foot of the mountain, each telling the story of a woman who appeared in their lives. Three stories were told. The three were surprised to find that the women in their stories clearly had different lives, but seemed to be inextricably linked. Each one began to speculate secretly, was the woman in these three stories the same person? And was what they saw the woman's real life? Is this life as it is? Or is it a story written by the girl, Lin Xi? Life is always full of unknowns and doubts.
response.title: Maze
